name: Dragon Escape
description:
That moment when you know you're close, but you don't know exactly how much you have left...

The Dragon Escape is a casual-funny game. The action takes place on a spaceship where our hero has been locked up as a prisoner for a long time. Your mission is to help the poor dragon to find the right doors for exit and in same time be sure to avoid contact with those who wish him harm.

To make it easier for you, the developers have created a camera from above to see who is hiding in each room. Will the dragon escape alive and unharmed?

Game Features :
- 6 dragon skins
- Only one exit door
- Enemies with visibility sensors
